title: Ticket #4195: Add more detail to DAGMan node status file

remarks:

We may only want to do this in the proposed classad format (see #4193) so we don't goof up any existing parsers for the current format.

FWIW - I consider this (probably a dup of #4115) and #4193 as the highest CMS DAG-related priority for the remaining 8.1 dev series.

We should probably touch base via phone (maybe with tannenba and/or Miron) to figure out the best way to get this done. I'd like to fold the DAGMan-side improvements into our plans so we don't have to do extraordinarily crazy things to hack this together ourselves.
